The door to the control room opened allowing K9 entrance. "I'm up 
here Maximal" Phobia called out. "Please don't touch anything I just 
got done spraying from the last maximal visitors." Phobia wanted K9 
to be comfortable but not to comfortable.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Richard Allen" <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> OOC: Maybe the toy was a German Shepard, but my K9 is a Golden 
> Retraver.
> And DrillBit is KKs boyfriend, let them have some fun.
> 
> ::K9::
> 
> The beams had hit K9s legs, but they were low powered. And now the 
> internal repairs. He was ready to fight, but thought o give talking 
a 
> chance. He walked into Phobias ship.
> "Hello? ANyone home?"
